alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Hopkins; Hunt; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 11:22AM CDT until July 16 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northern Hopkins County in north central Texas... Delta County in north central Texas... Lamar County in north central Texas... Eastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until noon CDT. * At 1122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Roxton, or 13 miles west of Paris, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Paris, Commerce, Cooper, Honey Grove, Blossom, Wolfe City, Roxton, Campbell, Cooper Lake, Pat Mayse Lake, Lake Crook, Powderly, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Greenville City Lakes, Crockett Lake, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake State Park and Pattonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
